hero.desc: Indawo ephephile, eqinisekisiwe lapho abantu bengakhuluma, bakhokhe, balondoloze, futhi bakhule ndawonye. Kusuka ezinkokhelweni ze-stokvel kuya ezazisweni zokuphepha, i-KasiLink iletha impilo yasekasi kuhlelo olulodwa olunamandla.

features.heading: Konke Umphakathi Wakho Okudingayo
features.subheading: I-KasiLink ihlanganisa wonke amathuluzi adingwa amalokishi ukuze achume - kusukela ezingxoxweni zansuku zonke kuya ekunikezeni amandla kwezezimali, konke kupulatifomu eyodwa ephephile.
features.ctaSub: Joyina izakhamuzi eziningi zaseNingizimu Afrika ezisebenzisa i-KasiLink ukwakha imiphakathi eqinile, exhumene kangcono ezweni lonke.

list.safeChatDesc: Amaqembu omakhelwane aqinisekisiwe anezaziso zokuphepha nezibuyekezo zomphakathi. Xhuma nomakhelwane bakho endaweni ethembekile.
list.stokvelDesc: Ama-stokvel edijithali enziwe alula. Landelela iminikelo, phatha izinkokhelo, futhi nikhulise ukonga ngokusobala.
list.businessDesc: Oda ezitolo ze-spaza, usekele abathengisi bendawo, futhi uthole osomabhizinisi basekasi endaweni yakho.
list.safetyDesc: Izaziso zokuphepha ngesikhathi sangempela, oxhumana nabo bezimo eziphuthumayo, kanye nokuhleleka kwe-neighborhood watch ukugcina wonke umuntu evikelekile.
list.eventsDesc: Hlela imicimbi yomphakathi, imihlangano yesonto, nemikhosi. Ungaphuthelwa ukuthi kwenzekani ekasi lakho.
list.growthDesc: Imijikelezo yokonga, amaqembu okutshalwa kwezimali, nezinsiza zokuqwashisa ngezezimali ukwakha ingcebo ndawonye njengomphakathi.

footer.newsletterDesc: Yiba ngowokuqala ukwazi lapho i-KasiLink yethulwa endaweni yakho. Joyina umphakathi wethu wabasunguli basekuqaleni abakhulisa ikusasa lokuxhumana kwamalokishi.
footer.brandDesc: Sigqugquzela amalokishi aseNingizimu Afrika ngobuchwepheshe. Sakha amabhuloho phakathi kwemiphakathi, uxhumano olulodwa ngesikhathi.

emergency.title: Oxhumana Nabo Eziphuthumayo
